resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106397</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106397</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Endangered Species Scavenger Hunt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gefährdete Sorte-Reiniger-Jagd</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chasse Mise en danger À Scavenger 
d'Espèces</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Caça Posta em perigo Do SCAVENGER Da Espécie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Pulitore In pericolo Di Specie 
Cerca</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διακυβευμένο κυνήγι οδοκαθαριστών ειδών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Caza Puesta en peligro Del Limpiador De la 
Especie</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson will help your students better understand endangered species. It requires a field trip to the North Carolina Zoological park.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion hilft Ihren Kursteilnehmern, besser 
gefährdete Sorte zu verstehen. Sie benötigt eine 
auffangenreise zum Nord-Carolina zoologischen Park.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon aidera vos étudiants mieux à 
comprendre des espèces mises en danger. Elle exige un 
voyage de zone au parc zoologique du nord de la Caroline.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição ajudará a seus estudantes mais 
melhor compreender a espécie posta em perigo. Requer um 
desengate de campo ao parque zoological de North.carolina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione aiuterà più meglio i vostri 
allievi a capire la specie in pericolo. Richiede un viaggio di 
campo al parco zoologico del North.carolina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα θα βοηθήσει τους σπουδαστές σας να 
καταλάβουν καλύτερα τα απειλούμενα υπό εξαφάνιση είδη. 
Απαιτεί ένα ταξίδι πεδίων στο ζωολογικό πάρκο της βόρειας
Καρολίνας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección ayudará a sus estudiantes mejor a 
entender especie puesta en peligro. Requiere un disparo al campo
al parque zoológico de Carolina del Norte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CRAIG SMITH
FN:CRAIG SMITH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202600</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106397</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/endangered-species-scavenger-hunt</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
